property.name: DefenderBriefing
property.value:
An enemy commander has launched a RECON RAID on a planet you are defending! The enemy's force of fast units has landed in a remote area from which they plan to gather intelligence. You are to intercept these scouts and drive them off world.

Command has issued strict orders, however, to minimize your losses. If you suffer any significant damage (>25% BV loss), you are to stop engaging with the enemy immediately and retreat. (We assess that the enemy commander will do the same.)

Good luck, Commander.

OPERATION FEATURES:
* Attacker Fast Units Only: Attacker units have a minimum walk/cruise of 5 -OR- minimum jump 4
* Standard Deployment: 83.3% chance combatants will start on opposite sides (16.7% chance of center/edge)

VICTORY CONDITONS (Probing Attack):
* Force opponent to surrender OR trigger auto-victory
* Auto-victory triggered when 1) 25% of enemy BV destroyed, and 2) friendly BV is 110% of enemy BV

BATTLE OUTCOMES:
* Land Exchange (None): No land exchange in this operation
* Intelligence (Standard Defender): +1 Intel, if winner
* Influence (Low Defender): 2000 BV: ~30 flu / 4000 BV: ~50 flu / 6000 BV: ~80 flu
* Operation Pay (MEDIUM): 2000 BV: ~3,264 CBills / 4000 BV: ~5,663 / 6000 BV: ~8,063 CBills
* Loss Penalty: -20% if defeated -- standard loss penalty
* Dishonorable Surrender: ADDITIONAL -20% pay if you surrender before a 20% BV loss
* Salvage (Standard): 40% Friendly/40% Enemy

***END BRIEFING***

property.name: AttackerBriefing
property.value:
You have initiated a RECON RAID on an enemy planet! Your force of raiders will be landing in a remote area from which you are to move out and gather intelligence. You are to engage whatever forces you might encounter once planeside and determine their capabilities.

Command has issued strict orders, however, to minimize your losses. If you suffer any significant damage (>25% BV loss), you are to stop engaging with the enemy immediately and retreat. (We assess that any opposing force will likely do the same.)

Success in this battle will pave the way for further strikes against the enemy. Good luck, Commander.

OPERATION FEATURES:
* Attacker Fast Units Only: Attacker units have a minimum walk/cruise of 5 -OR- minimum jump 4
* Standard Deployment: 83.3% chance combatants will start on opposite sides (16.7% chance of center/edge)

VICTORY CONDITONS (Probing Attack):
* Force opponent to surrender OR trigger auto-victory
* Auto-victory triggered when 1) 25% of enemy BV destroyed, and 2) friendly BV is 110% of enemy BV

BATTLE OUTCOMES:
* Land Exchange (None): No land exchange in this operation
* Intelligence (High): +3 Intel if winner
* Influence (None): No influence for attacker
* Operation Pay (LOW): 2000 BV: ~2,720 CBills / 4000 BV: ~4,720 CBills / 6000 BV: ~6,720 CBills
* Loss Penalty: -20% if defeated -- standard loss penalty
* Dishonorable Surrender: ADDITIONAL -20% pay if you surrender before a 20% BV loss
* Salvage (Standard): 40% Friendly/40% Enemy

***END BRIEFING***
